title: Hidden Bomb
desc:
Post 2237
- When you play this, choose any player other than yourself.
- One of their cards will have a Bomb hidden in it.
- When this is played, the last digit of the card with the Bomb will be revealed publicly, but the identuty of the player who holds the card will be kept secret.
- At the start of your next turn, if the card with the Bomb still exists in its owner's hand, the Bomb will explode. The card it was hiding in will be discarded, but the owner of it will draw 5 cards.
